item.title: Sporting Lisbon Taps JPMorgan for €100 Million-Plus Debt Sale
item.description: Sporting Lisbon is working with JPMorgan Chase & Co. on a plan to raise at least €100 million ($117 million) in debt in the coming months, according to people familiar with the matter.

item.title: Worst Spate of Downgrades Since 2021 Signals Pain

item.title: JPMorgan Says Korean Stock Gauge May Near 5,000 Over Two Years
item.description: South Korea’s equity benchmark may rise more than 50% from its current level over a two-year period should corporate governance reforms gain momentum, according to JPMorgan Chase & Co.
